snippet.title: Police seek help to find 75-year-old
snippet.content: POLICE are looking for a man, 75, who went missing from a nursing home overnight. Colin George Hirt was last seen in the Mornington area about 6pm on Wednesday and police are concerned for his welfare. Tasmania Police Sergeant Erica Franks said Mr Hirt was described as being about 183cm tall and of average build, with grey hair that is balding. "Mr Hirt left Lillian Martin nursing home wearing a fawn coloured polo shirt with stripes, brown slacks and blue slippers," Sergeant Franks said. "Mr Hirt is new to Tasmania, he is not familiar with his surroundings and will likely be confused and disoriented." Anyone who sees Mr Hirt is asked to contact Tasmania Police on 131 444.
